Prerequisites: ACG 2001 OR ACG 2021 W/A GRADE OF C OR BETTER
Course Description: THIS IS A STUDY OF MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING CONCEPTS AND PRINCIPLES, JOB ORDER COST SYSTEMS, PROCESS COST SYSTEMS, COST BEHAVIOR AND COST-VOLUME-PROFIT ANALYSIS, BUDGETING, VARIANCE ANALYSIS, DIFFERENTIAL ANALYSIS, AND CAPITAL INVESTMENT ANALYSIS.
Textbook(s): HANSEN AND MOWEN, MANAGEMENT ACCOUNTING. CURRENT EDITION.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
